sentence.text: This close biochemical relationship indicates an oncogenic role for Fc-gamma receptor signaling pathway involved in phagocytosis in the physiology of cancer pathology by increasing YAP/TAZ stability

entity.text: Fc-gamma receptor signaling pathway involved in phagocytosis

sentence.text: We find that Fc-gamma receptor signaling pathway involved in phagocytosis controls tumor growth by boosting signals that stabilize the YAP/TAZ complex via a mechanism mediated by the endocytic/endosomal system.

entity.text: Fc-gamma receptor signaling pathway involved in phagocytosis
